tasks.name: check for JDK on remote box

options.name: check for JDK on remote box
query Adoptium
options.when: (java_major_version | default(None)) in (None, '', omit) or java_release_name in (None, '', omit) or java_redis_filename in (None, '', omit) or java_redis_sha256sum in (None, '', omit) or (java_redis_mirror in (None, '', omit) and not remote_jdk_file.stat.exists)

tasks.name: check for JDK on remote box

options.name: check for JDK on remote box

tasks.name: check JDK archive layout
tasks.module_options:
set -o pipefail
tar --list --file {{ (java_download_dir + '/' + java_redis_filename) | quote }} | grep --quiet '^\.'

tasks.name: export JAVA_HOME and add to PATH

options.name: export JAVA_HOME and add to PATH

tasks.name: check for JDK on local box

options.name: check for JDK on local box

tasks.name: set major version var from API

options.name: set major version var from API

tasks.name: set release name var from API

options.name: set release name var from API

tasks.name: set JDK URL var from API

options.name: set JDK URL var from API
when: java_redis_filename in (None, '', omit) or not remote_jdk_file.stat.exists

tasks.name: set checksum URL var from API

options.name: set checksum URL var from API

tasks.name: set JDK filename var from API

options.name: set JDK filename var from API
